title: anyone have a beater t206 Tinker or Chance for about $40?
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: anyone have a beater t206 Tinker or Chance for about $40?
posts.post_content:
Looking for a T206 Tinker hands on knees, bat off shoulder, portrait or
Frank Chance - batting or red portrait for my sons team set for around $40. Condition obviously not much of an issue. email me at [url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]
Sean, for you yes.  I have a hands on knees.  Email sent.

Thanks Toby! Still looking for the following:

Evers - portrait
Tinker - portrait, batting
Chance - batting, red portrait
Lundgren
Schulte - side
Zimmerman
Sheckard - non throwing pose
Browne
Pfeister - both

Heres a pic of my son Maxwell (plus my youngest) checking out his team set so far :)

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=88508&d=1361241977[/IMG]
Thanks nate and chris! My son really like mordecai brown. I showed him a pic of his hand and he was ecstatic lol
